| HistoryText             = The [[Melf (Earth-616)|Elf with a Gun]] was a mysteriously homicidal figure, that killed a number of seemingly random people,{{r|Defenders Vol 1 25}}{{r|Defenders Vol 1 31}}{{r|Defenders Vol 1 38}}{{r|Defenders Vol 1 40}} before unceremoniously being run over by a truck.{{r|Defenders Vol 1 46}}

Sometime later, another Elf appeared operating with a similar M.O..{{r|Defenders Vol 1 115}} He and other Elves like him were servants of the alien [[Tribunals]] and were used by them as part of a complex and seemingly pointless scheme to break up the [[Defenders (Earth-616)|Defenders]].{{r|Defenders Vol 1 122|125}} [[Stephen Strange (Earth-616)|Doctor Strange]] later determined the Tribunals revelations to be a "cosmic hoax,"{{r|Incredible Hulk Vol 1 370}} leaving the true motives of the original Elf and the later ones unconfirmed.

| Equipment               = 
| Transportation          = Vintage car able to traverse dimensions.{{Citation}}
| Weapons                 = Guns

| Notes                   = There is no known connections between the Elves with Guns and other races of Elves, such as the [[Elves of Asgard]], the [[Elves of Otherworld]], or the [[Elves of Weirdworld]].{{r|All-New Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 4}}
